T02D2430:46b-1: sh'u n+ya t'a k'a ru na drishthi n'a ma /
T02D2430:46b-3: stong nyid snying rje'i lta ba zhes bya ba /
T02D2430:46b-4: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2430:46b-5: mi gtsang ba yi srid pa dang //
T02D2430:46b-6: 'jig rten pa yi spyod pa dang //
T02D2430:46b-7: rnam pas dpyad cing bltas bas na //
T02D2430:46b-8: dngos po stong pa nyid du snang //
T02D2430:46b-9: kye ma snying rje da ma ru //
T02D2430:46b-10: sgra sgrogs pa ni ngo mtshar che //
T02D2430:46b-11: a'arya de ba dmigs med pa'i //
T02D2430:46b-12: rgyal bo'i srid la ngoms pa med //
T02D2430:46b-13: gang du yid dang rlung dag dang //
T02D2430:46b-14: dbang po gnas pa yod min na //
T02D2430:46b-15: bdag ni gang du 'gro ba dang //
T02D2430:46b-16: gang du gnas pa ma shes so //
T02D2430:46b-17: kye ma snying rje da ma ru //
T02D2430:46b-18: sgra sgrogs pa ni ngo mtshar che //
T02D2430:46b-19: a'arya de ba dmigs med pa'i //
T02D2430:46b-20: rgyal po'i srid la ngoms pa med //
T02D2430:46b-21: zla ba las ni zla ba yi //
T02D2430:46b-23: lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin ni //
T02D2430:46b-25: kye ma snying rje da ma ru //
T02D2430:46b-26: sgra sgrogs pa ni ngo mtshar che //
T02D2430:46b-27: a'arya de ba dmigs med pa'i //
T02D2430:46b-28: rgyal po'i srid la ngoms ba med //
T02D2430:46b-29: a'arya de ba thams cad spyang //
T02D2430:46b-30: spyang pas rang bzhin dmigs med 'gyur //
T02D2430:46b-31: kye ma snying rje da ma ru //
T02D2430:46b-32: sgra sgrogs ba ni ngo mtshar che //
T02D2430:46b-33: a'arya de ba dmigs med pa'i //
T02D2430:46b-34: rgyal po'i srid la ngoms pa med //
T02D2430:46b-35: stong nyid snying rje'i lta ba zhes bya ba slob
T02D2430:46b-36: dpon chen po a'arya de ba nas brgyud pa slob
